Package org.nre.flightsys.service

Class POIService

java.lang.Object
org.nre.flightsys.service.POIService
@Service public class POIService extends Object
The POIService class represents the service logic regarding POIs.

    • getAllPOIs

      public static POI[] getAllPOIs(String destination) throws FileNotFoundException
      Returns all POIs in the given destination city.
      Parameters:
      destination - the destination city
      Returns:
      all POIs of the destination city
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when destination city not found in local data chunk

      public static POI[] filter(POI[] pois, int threshold)

      threshold - a threshold for popularity

    • savePOI

      public void savePOI(POI poi) throws IOException
      Persist the given POI to disk.
      Parameters:
      poi - the given POI
      Throws:
      IOException - when the chunk file for persistence could not be created
